info.description: The Data Science Platform's source-of-truth service
info.title: Sherlock

post.description: Create a new AppVersion entry. Note that fields are immutable after creation.

parameters.description: The AppVersion to create
parameters.name: app-version

get.description: Get an existing AppVersion entry via one its "selector"--its numeric ID.

parameters.description: The AppVersion to get's selector: name or numeric ID
parameters.name: selector

get.description: List existing AppVersion entries, ordered by most recently updated.

parameters.description: An optional limit to the number of entries returned
parameters.name: limit

post.description: List existing AppVersion entries, ordered by most recently updated. Entries will be filtered to only return ones matching the provided non-empty fields in the body.
post.summary: List AppVersion entries with field filters

parameters.description: An optional limit to the number of entries returned
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The fields and values to filter on (omit a field to not filter based on it)
parameters.name: app-version

get.description: Validate a given AppVersion selector and provide any other selectors that would match the same AppVersion.

parameters.description: The selector of the AppVersion to list other selectors for
parameters.name: selector

parameters.description: An optional limit to the number of entries returned

parameters.description: The fields and values to filter on (omit a field to not filter based on it)

post.description: Create a new ChartRelease entry. Note that some fields are immutable after creation; /edit lists mutable fields.

parameters.description: The ChartRelease to create
parameters.name: chart-release

delete.description: Delete an existing ChartRelease entry via one of its "selectors": name, numeric ID, environment/chart, or cluster/namespace/chart.

parameters.description: The ChartRelease to delete's selector: name or numeric ID
parameters.name: selector

patch.description: Edit an existing ChartRelease entry via one of its "selectors": name, numeric ID, environment/chart, or cluster/namespace/chart. Note that only mutable fields are available here, immutable fields can only be set using /create.

parameters.description: The ChartRelease to edit's selector: name or numeric ID
parameters.name: selector

parameters.description: The edits to make to the ChartRelease
parameters.name: chart-release

get.description: Get an existing ChartRelease entry via one of its "selectors": name, numeric ID, environment/chart, or cluster/namespace/chart.

parameters.description: The ChartRelease to get's selector: name or numeric ID
parameters.name: selector

get.description: List existing ChartRelease entries, ordered by most recently updated.

parameters.description: An optional limit to the number of entries returned
parameters.name: limit

post.description: List existing ChartRelease entries, ordered by most recently updated. Entries will be filtered to only return ones matching the provided non-empty fields in the body.
post.summary: List ChartRelease entries with field filters

parameters.description: An optional limit to the number of entries returned
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The fields and values to filter on (omit a field to not filter based on it)
parameters.name: chart-release

get.description: Validate a given ChartRelease selector and provide any other selectors that would match the same ChartRelease.

parameters.description: The selector of the ChartRelease to list other selectors for
parameters.name: selector

get.description: Get Sherlock's understanding of the calling user based on IAP and Google Groups.
get.summary: Get information about the calling user

get.description: Get the build version of this Sherlock instance.

v2controllers.Cluster.description: The full set of Cluster fields that can be read or used for filtering queries

v2controllers.CreatableCluster.description: The subset of Cluster fields that can be set upon creation

v2controllers.EditableCluster.description: The subset of Cluster fields that can be edited after creation

templateEnvironmentInfo.description: Single-layer recursive; provides info of the template environment if this environment has one
